title: Uzzle, The Football Star
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 339 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 440L, Fiction Series
description: Uzzle has a problem--he wants a football helmet but cannot afford one. Jupe suggests they look for one at a thrift store. Uzzle chooses a helmet that he thinks makes him look like a star. But it is too big, which causes him to trip and fall. What will Uzzle do with his new helmet? This book provides an excellent opportunity to introduce problem and solution. Entertaining pictures support the text.
meta: curb, football, helmet, pass, punt, thrift store
Use the strategy of retelling to understand and remember story events
Problem and Solution : Identify problem and solution

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
